title: US 175 Dallas photos
text: This page shows driving views of the original S.M. Wright Freeway which was removed and converted to a boulevard street after the opening of the new section of freeway west of "Dead Man's Corner" in July 2020. Demolition of the freeway began in 2021, and S.M. Wright Boulevard is expected to be completed in 2023.

images.caption: Merging with the SH 175 main lanes.

imageStatus.note: The freeway was demolished 2021-2023 and replaced with a boulevard street.

images.caption: This is a left merge with a short merging distance. It is just one of several low-quality design features at this intersection, often called "Dead Man's Corner".

imageStatus.note: The freeway was demolished 2021-2023 and replaced with a boulevard street.
The freeway was demolished 2021-2023 and replaced with a boulevard street.

images.caption: The freeway ends at I-45 one mile ahead.
The MLK Jr Blvd overpass is just ahead. The end of the freeway at I-45 is just past MLK.
